Rule.name: NS_Rule_Financial_Planning_FieldValue_UserLevel
Rule.Description: This rule can be used to generate a field value using data from the given Identity.

Argument.name: log
Argument.Description: The log object associated with the SailPoint context.

Argument.name: context
Argument.Description: A sailpoint.api.SailPointContext object that can be used to query the database if necessary.

Argument.name: identity
Argument.Description: The Identity object that represents the user needing the field value.

Argument.name: link
Argument.Description: The sailpoint.object.Link that is being acted upon. If the link is not applicable, this value will be null.

Argument.name: application
Argument.Description: The sailpoint.object.Application with the template we are compiling. If the application is not applicable, the value will be null.
